exception.name: NAnt exception to GPL 2.0 or later

text.p: In addition, as a special exception, Gerry Shaw gives permission to link the code of this program with the Microsoft .NET library (or with modified versions of Microsoft .NET library that use the same license as the Microsoft .NET library), and distribute linked combinations including the two. You must obey the GNU General Public License in all respects for all of the code used other than the Microsoft .NET library. If you modify this file, you may extend this exception to your version of the file, but you are not obligated to do so. If you do not wish to do so, delete this exception statement from your version.
